SEARCH
Package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service.GameService
@Singleton public class GameService extends Object
Manages the different game operations that can happen in a game of UNO.

The service class handles creating new games, starting existing games, retrieving game state, and handling player actions. It uses UnoServiceProxy and UnoServiceLongProxy for communicating with the webserver and GoogleSignInService for authentication.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameService

      @Inject public GameService(UnoServiceProxy proxy, UnoServiceLongProxy longProxy, GoogleSignInService signInService)
      Constructs an instance of the GameService using the provided proxies and GoogleSignInService.
      Parameters:
      proxy - The proxy used to send game operation requests to application's web service.
      longProxy - The proxy used to send long-polling request to the application's web service for game updates.
      signInService - Google sign-in service used to authenticate users.

  • Method Details

    • createGame

      public Single<Game> createGame(int minPlayerCount, int maxPlayerCount)
      Creates a new game of UNO with the specified min and max player count.
      Parameters:
      minPlayerCount - int representing the minimum number of players that need to join the UNO game for it to start.
      maxPlayerCount - int representing the maximum number of players that can join the UNO game.
      Returns:
      An RxJava Single of a Game.

    • startGame

      public Single<Game> startGame(Game game)
      Starts an existing game of UNO.
      Parameters:
      game - The game to be started.
      Returns:
      An RxJava Single of the Game which is started.

    • submitMove

      public Single<Game> submitMove(Game game, Card card)
      Submits a player's move in a Game of UNO.
      Parameters:
      game - The game which the move is being submitted to.
      card - The card which is being submitted as a player's move.
      Returns:
      An RxJava Single of the Game which is getting a move submitted to.

    • drawCard

      public Single<Game> drawCard(Game game)
      Draws a card for a user.
      Parameters:
      game - The game which the user is drawing a card for.
      Returns:
      An RxJava Single of the Game which gets updated after the user's draw.
